subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jorge Sosa, who stabilized the back of the Mets’ rotation by winning six of his first seven starts, has been shifted to the bullpen as the team readies for the eventual return of Pedro Martínez.
snippet: Jorge Sosa, who stabilized the back of the Mets’ rotation by winning six of his first seven starts, has been shifted to the bullpen as the team readies for the eventual return of Pedro Martínez.
